channel.title: Mails configuration and DNS
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I'm using Redash with Docker and I would like to know if it's possible to change the IP adress (XXX.XXX.XXX.YY:5000) with a domain name in mails ? Any idea to do it ?
![Capture|647x304](upload://tsNT0tNDlehRXx2Nit9dSzHt1m3.jpeg)
For example : XXX.XXX.XXX.YY:5000 --> "myredash.com"
Thanks in advance :slight_smile:

item.title: Mails configuration and DNS
item.dc:creator: willy-dauphin
item.description:
Hi everyone,
I’m using Redash with Docker and I would like to know if it’s possible to change the IP adress (XXX.XXX.XXX.YY:5000) with a domain name in mails ? Any idea to do it ?

For example : XXX.XXX.XXX.YY:5000 → “myredash.com”

Thanks in advance

Read full topic
